metadata.synopsis: In the stormshore tabernacle, as part of his behaviour, the temple guardian will pray. The guardian has no god at the moment, but we can make him to pray to "all gods" or to the god that fits more with the situation.The praying point is in front of the generic shrine, but can be moved to the other ones without problem.
metadata.how_to_trigger: The character S_LOW_TempleGuardian_32ec6ad3-c085-4fc5-943b-e2e3a05d9f2b will move to the point (TRIGGER)S_LOW_StormshoreTabernacle_PrayPoint_9afca468-b88c-4355-b34d-ea858ed14eaf steer to the shrine S_LOW_GenericGodStatue_d71704b6-24b6-46b7-982c-89acb3edfc20 and pray.

2.speaker: Vicar Humbletoes
2.text: Divine protectors of Baldur's Gate, hear this humble plea.

1.speaker: Vicar Humbletoes
1.text: Shield our people from the depredations of the Absolute heretics.

0.speaker: Vicar Humbletoes
0.text: Bless them with the strength to endure and the courage to resist. So may it be.
